name: skunky
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a strong, unpleasant smell, like the smell produced by a skunk (= a small, black and white North American animal): When male gorillas are stressed, they emit testosterone, which has an overwhelmingly skunky odour. The fat turns rancid easily and gives meat that skunky smell.
the strong smell of skunkweed (= a drug, illegal in many countries, that is made from the dried leaves and flowers of the hemp plant): You can smell the skunky scent of marijuana coming from inside.
More examplesFewer examplesPeople describe some of the chemical vapour smells as skunky or sewerlike.It was a skunky smell that became associated with a visit to the hairdresser.A skunky odour permeates the air in the hallways surrounding his room.
